class Ensemble[source]

Ensemble(dls, n_models:int=10, learn_func=Learner, cv:bool=False, **learner_kwargs)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Create Ensemble of Learners with n_models. Works pretty much like a single Learner
